biotools.summary: Novel way of modeling the problem as combinatorial optimization problem on graphs: Weighted Bi-Cluster Editing. It is a very flexible model that can handle arbitrary kinds of multi-condition data sets (not limited to gene expression).

bioschemas.name: Bi-Force
bioschemas.summary: Novel way of modeling the problem as combinatorial optimization problem on graphs: Weighted Bi-Cluster Editing. It is a very flexible model that can handle arbitrary kinds of multi-condition data sets (not limited to gene expression).
